# MCP Testing Tracker Project

This is a Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for managing testing checklists with SQLite persistence and a web interface.

## Architecture
- MCP Server: Exposes testing tools via stdio protocol
- Database: SQLite3 for data persistence  
- Web Server: Express.js for REST API and static content
- Frontend: Vanilla HTML/CSS/JavaScript

## Key Features
- Create and manage test suites
- Add/update test cases with status tracking
- Filter and search functionality
- Real-time progress tracking
- Simple web interface for visualization

Project is being scaffolded with all required components.
